participant_1.background:
I'll be watching wrestling with my boyfriend.
I am determined to work hard and be the best that I can be, despite my circumstances.
I like to relax and eat watermelon on the weekend.
i enjoy running at night.
I'd like to build a soundproof practice room for my guitar.

participant_2.background:
I love to make tasty carrot soup in my spare time.
i love comic books.
i prefer winter over fall.
I would like to learn how to train my dogs to behave better.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, so I can keep my spirits up while I'm on bed rest.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing?
Great! How about you?
I'm doing alright.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to run at night, watch wrestling, and play guitar.
That sounds cool! I like to make carrot soup, read comic books, and listen to upbeat music.
Carrot soup is delicious! I've never read a comic book, but I've heard they can be really good.
You should definitely give them a try! They're a lot of fun. And what kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like music that is upbeat and energetic. It helps to keep my spirits up.
That's good! I like music that is upbeat and energetic too. It helps me to get through the day.
Me too! It's a great way to start the day.
Yeah, it is!
What do you like to do on the weekends?
I like to relax and eat watermelon. It's my favorite fruit.
Watermelon is delicious! I love to eat it on a hot summer day.
Me too! It's so refreshing.
What else do you like to do?
I like to watch wrestling with my boyfriend. It's our favorite thing to do together.
That sounds fun! I've never watched wrestling, but I've heard it can be really exciting.
It is! It's a lot of fun to watch.
I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
